author: danj
msg: added comments to yesterday's RMD-based code.

author: jboynes
msg: push getInstallDirectory() down from RuntimeInfo to StandaloneRuntimeInfo
The concept of a installation directory does not apply to all runtime modes e.g. when in a webapp
This highlights problems with integration test cases based on SCATestCase running in the unit test phase - commented them out for now.
